verses.verse: הַחֲרִ֤ישׁוּ <WH2790> Keep silence אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about אִיִּ֔ים <WH339> before me O islands וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <WH3816> and let the people יַחֲלִ֣יפוּ <WH2498> renew כֹ֑חַ <WH3581> [their] strength יִגְּשׁוּ֙ <WH5066> let them come near אָ֣ז <WH227> then יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> then let them speak יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> to judgment נִקְרָֽבָה׃ <WH7126> let us come near

מִ֤י <WH4310> Who הֵעִיר֙ <WH5782> Who raised up מִמִּזְרָ֔ח <WH4217> [man] from the east צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> the righteous יִקְרָאֵ֣הוּ <WH7121> called לְרַגְל֑וֹ <WH7272> him to his foot יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> gave לְפָנָ֤יו <WH6440> before גּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> the nations וּמְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> kings יַ֔רְדְּ <WH7287> him and made [him] rule יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> makes כֶּֽעָפָר֙ <WH6083> [them] as the dust חַרְבּ֔וֹ <WH2719> to his sword כְּקַ֥שׁ <WH7179> stubble נִדָּ֖ף <WH5086> [and] as driven קַשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH7198> to his bow

יִרְדְּפֵ֖ם <WH7291> He pursued יַעֲב֣וֹר <WH5674> them [and] passed שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> safely אֹ֥רַח <WH734> [even] by the way בְּרַגְלָ֖יו <WH7272> with his feet לֹ֥א <WH3808> had not יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> [that] he had not gone

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who פָעַ֣ל <WH6466> Who hath wrought וְעָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> and done קֹרֵ֥א <WH7121> [it] calling הַדֹּר֖וֹת <WH1755> the generations מֵרֹ֑אשׁ <WH7218> band אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Jehovah רִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> the first וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַחֲרֹנִ֖ים <WH314> and with the last אֲנִי־ <WH589> I הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

רָא֤וּ <WH7200> saw אִיִּים֙ <WH339> The isles וְיִירָ֔אוּ <WH3372> [it] and feared קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> the ends הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth יֶחֱרָ֑דוּ <WH2729> were afraid קָרְב֖וּ <WH7126> drew near וַיֶּאֱתָיֽוּן׃ <WH857> and came

אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour יַעְזֹ֑רוּ <WH5826> They helped וּלְאָחִ֖יו <WH251> to his brother יֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> and [every one] said חֲזָֽק׃ <WH2388> Be of good courage

וַיְחַזֵּ֤ק <WH2388> encouraged חָרָשׁ֙ <WH2796> So the carpenter אֶת־ <WH853> צֹרֵ֔ף <WH6884> the goldsmith מַחֲלִ֥יק <WH2505> [and] he that smootheth פַּטִּ֖ישׁ <WH6360> [with] the hammer אֶת־ <WH853> ה֣וֹלֶם <WH1986> him that smote פָּ֑עַם <WH6471> the anvil אֹמֵ֤ר <WH559> saying לַדֶּ֙בֶק֙ <WH1694> for the sodering ט֣וֹב <WH2896> It [is] ready ה֔וּא <WH1931> and he וַיְחַזְּקֵ֥הוּ <WH2388> and he fastened בְמַסְמְרִ֖ים <WH4548> it with nails לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> [that] it should not be moved ס

וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> But thou Israel עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> [art] my servant יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom בְּחַרְתִּ֑יךָ <WH977> whom I have chosen זֶ֖רַע <WH2233> the seed אַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> of Abraham אֹהֲבִֽי׃ <WH157> my friend

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom הֶחֱזַקְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH2388> [Thou] whom I have taken מִקְצ֣וֹת <WH7098> from the ends הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וּמֵאֲצִילֶ֖יהָ <WH678> thee from the chief men קְרָאתִ֑יךָ <WH7121> and called וָאֹ֤מַר <WH559> thereof and said לְךָ֙ עַבְדִּי־ <WH5650> unto thee Thou [art] my servant אַ֔תָּה <WH859> I בְּחַרְתִּ֖יךָ <WH977> I have chosen וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not מְאַסְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH3988> thee and not cast thee away

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> Fear כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עִמְּךָ־ <WH5973> with אָ֔נִי <WH589> I אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁתָּ֖ע <WH8159> thou not for I [am] with thee be not dismayed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> for I [am] thy God אִמַּצְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH553> I will strengthen אַף־ <WH637> surely עֲזַרְתִּ֔יךָ <WH5826> thee yea I will help אַף־ <WH637> Surely תְּמַכְתִּ֖יךָ <WH8551> thee yea I will uphold בִּימִ֥ין <WH3225> thee with the right hand צִדְקִֽי׃ <WH6664> of my righteousness

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold יֵבֹ֙שׁוּ֙ <WH954> against thee shall be ashamed וְיִכָּ֣לְמ֔וּ <WH3637> and confounded כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all הַנֶּחֱרִ֣ים <WH2734> Behold all they that were incensed בָּ֑ךְ יִֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> will be as כְאַ֛יִן <WH369> nothing וְיֹאבְד֖וּ <WH6> with thee shall perish אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> Those רִיבֶֽךָ׃ <WH7379> that strive

תְּבַקְשֵׁם֙ <WH1245> Thou shalt seek וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> but will not תִמְצָאֵ֔ם <WH4672> them and shalt not find אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> those מַצֻּתֶ֑ךָ <WH4695> that contended יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> will be as כְאַ֛יִן <WH369> nothing וּכְאֶ֖פֶס <WH657> against thee shall be as nothing and as a thing of nought אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> who מִלְחַמְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH4421> with thee they that war

כִּ֗י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God מַחֲזִ֣יק <WH2388> will hold יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> thy right hand הָאֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> saying לְךָ֛ אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> unto thee Fear אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I עֲזַרְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH5826> not I will help ס

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְאִי֙ <WH3372> Fear תּוֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> not thou worm יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob מְתֵ֖י <WH4962> [and] ye men יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I עֲזַרְתִּיךְ֙ <WH5826> I will help נְאֻם־ <WH5002> thee saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְגֹאֲלֵ֖ךְ <WH1350> and thy redeemer קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold שַׂמְתִּ֗יךְ <WH7760> Behold I will make לְמוֹרַג֙ <WH4173> threshing חָר֣וּץ <WH2742> sharp חָדָ֔שׁ <WH2319> thee a new בַּ֖עַל <WH1167> instrument having פִּֽיפִיּ֑וֹת <WH6374> teeth תָּד֤וּשׁ <WH1758> thou shalt thresh הָרִים֙ <WH2022> the mountains וְתָדֹ֔ק <WH1854> and beat [them] small וּגְבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> the hills כַּמֹּ֥ץ <WH4671> as chaff תָּשִֽׂים׃ <WH7760> and shalt make

תִּזְרֵם֙ <WH2219> Thou shalt fan וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> them and the wind תִּשָּׂאֵ֔ם <WH5375> shall carry them away וּסְעָרָ֖ה <WH5591> and the whirlwind תָּפִ֣יץ <WH6327> shall scatter אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you תָּגִ֣יל <WH1523> them and thou shalt rejoice בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> in the LORD בִּקְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> in the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel תִּתְהַלָּֽל׃ <WH1984> [and] shalt glory פ

הָעֲנִיִּ֨ים <WH6041> [When] the poor וְהָאֶבְיוֹנִ֜ים <WH34> and needy מְבַקְשִׁ֥ים <WH1245> seek מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> water וָאַ֔יִן <WH369> there לְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <WH3956> and [there is] none [and] their tongue בַּצָּמָ֣א <WH6772> for thirst נָשָׁ֑תָּה <WH5405> faileth אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> I the LORD אֶעֱנֵ֔ם <WH6030> will hear אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> them I the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֶעֶזְבֵֽם׃ <WH5800> will not forsake

אֶפְתַּ֤ח <WH6605> I will open עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁפָיִים֙ <WH8205> in high places נְהָר֔וֹת <WH5104> rivers וּבְת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst בְּקָע֖וֹת <WH1237> of the valleys מַעְיָנ֑וֹת <WH4599> and fountains אָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> I will make מִדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> the wilderness לַאֲגַם־ <WH98> a pool מַ֔יִם <WH4325> of water וְאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> land צִיָּ֖ה <WH6723> and the dry לְמוֹצָ֥אֵי <WH4161> springs מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of water

אֶתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> I will plant בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> in the wilderness אֶ֣רֶז <WH730> the cedar שִׁטָּ֔ה <WH7848> the shittah tree וַהֲדַ֖ס <WH1918> and the myrtle וְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree שָׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> and the oil אָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> I will set בָּעֲרָבָ֗ה <WH6160> in the desert בְּר֛וֹשׁ <WH1265> the fir tree תִּדְהָ֥ר <WH8410> [and] the pine וּתְאַשּׁ֖וּר <WH8391> and the box tree יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together

לְמַ֧עַן <WH4616> because of יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> That they may see וְיֵדְע֗וּ <WH3045> and know וְיָשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> and consider וְיַשְׂכִּ֙ילוּ֙ <WH7919> and understand יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> together כִּ֥י <WH3588> That יַד־ <WH3027> that the hand יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עָ֣שְׂתָה <WH6213> hath done זֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise וּקְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> this and the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּרָאָֽהּ׃ <WH1254> hath created פ

קָרְב֥וּ <WH7126> Produce רִֽיבְכֶ֖ם <WH7379> your cause יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הַגִּ֙ישׁוּ֙ <WH5066> bring forth עֲצֻמ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6110> your strong יֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> [reasons] saith מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the King יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

יַגִּ֙ישׁוּ֙ <WH5066> Let them bring [them] forth וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> and shew לָ֔נוּ אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what תִּקְרֶ֑ינָה <WH7136> us what shall happen הָרִאשֹׁנ֣וֹת ׀ <WH7223> the former things מָ֣ה <WH4100> what הֵ֗נָּה <WH2007> in הַגִּ֜ידוּ <WH5046> let them shew וְנָשִׂ֤ימָה <WH7760> may consider לִבֵּ֙נוּ֙ <WH3820> care for וְנֵדְעָ֣ה <WH3045> them and know אַחֲרִיתָ֔ן <WH319> the latter end א֥וֹ <WH176> Or הַבָּא֖וֹת <WH935> us things for to come הַשְׁמִיעֻֽנוּ׃ <WH8085> of them or declare

הַגִּ֙ידוּ֙ <WH5046> Shew הָאֹתִיּ֣וֹת <WH857> the things that are to come לְאָח֔וֹר <WH268> hereafter וְנֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <WH3045> that we may know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> that ye [are] gods אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> you אַף־ <WH637> Indeed תֵּיטִ֣יבוּ <WH3190> yea do good וְתָרֵ֔עוּ <WH7489> or do evil וְנִשְׁתָּ֖עָה <WH8159> that we may be dismayed [וְנֵרֶא כ] (וְנִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> advise self ק) יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> [it] together

הֵן־ <WH2005> Behold אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you מֵאַ֔יִן <WH369> Behold ye [are] of nothing וּפָעָלְכֶ֖ם <WH6467> and your work מֵאָ֑פַע <WH659> of nought תּוֹעֵבָ֖ה <WH8441> an abomination יִבְחַ֥ר <WH977> [is he that] chooseth בָּכֶֽם׃

הַעִיר֤וֹתִי <WH5782> I have raised up מִצָּפוֹן֙ <WH6828> [one] from the north וַיַּ֔את <WH857> and he shall come מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> from the rising שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> shall he call בִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> upon my name וְיָבֹ֤א <WH935> and he shall come סְגָנִים֙ <WH5461> upon princes כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> according to חֹ֔מֶר <WH2563> as [upon] morter וּכְמ֥וֹ <WH3644> Even יוֹצֵ֖ר <WH3335> and as the potter יִרְמָס־ <WH7429> treadeth טִֽיט׃ <WH2916> clay

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who הִגִּ֤יד <WH5046> Who hath declared מֵרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> from the beginning וְנֵדָ֔עָה <WH3045> that we may know וּמִלְּפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> ? and beforetime וְנֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> that we may say צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> just אַ֣ף <WH637> Surely אֵין־ <WH369> there מַגִּ֗יד <WH5046> declared אַ֚ף <WH637> Surely אֵ֣ין <WH369> was no מַשְׁמִ֔יעַ <WH8085> yea [there is] none that declareth אַ֥ף <WH637> Surely אֵין־ <WH369> one שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> yea [there is] none that heareth אִמְרֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH561> your words

רִאשׁ֥וֹן <WH7223> The first לְצִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> [shall say] to Zion הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold הִנָּ֑ם <WH2005> and to וְלִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem מְבַשֵּׂ֥ר <WH1319> one that bringeth good tidings אֶתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> them and I will give

וְאֵ֙רֶא֙ <WH7200> For I beheld וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> there אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> and [there was] no man וּמֵאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> another וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is no יוֹעֵ֑ץ <WH3289> even among them and [there was] no counsellor וְאֶשְׁאָלֵ֖ם <WH7592> that when I asked וְיָשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7725> of them could answer דָבָֽר׃ <WH1697> a word

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all אָ֥וֶן <WH205> Behold they [are] all vanity אֶ֖פֶס <WH657> [are] nothing מַעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH4639> their works ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> [are] wind וָתֹ֖הוּ <WH8414> and confusion נִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH5262> their molten images פ
